table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_member` ( `id` int(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(225) NOT NULL, `userpass` varchar(225) NOT NULL, `sex` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL, `pic` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1001 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
